profile_summary: Highly skilled engineer with experience in C, Python, and TypeScript, driving innovative solutions in AI/ML, UI/UX Design and Front-end Development. With a strong background in coding, learning and designing, I'm contributing to 37 open-source projects as a professional developer. My commitment to continuous learning is demonstrated through my active participation in Kaggle competitions and WakaTime statistics, backed by a strong network of 7 followers on GitHub.
